Scene Data
Hello everyone!

Scene Data is here: https://mega.nz/folder/KyxyGYTa#tbsV-JP507LTZEYIyoYrYA

All major scenes are there, I will update the rest of the smaller scenes in the future.
If some of the scenes are different from my images, for example steam, mouth color, etc.
I use Photoshop and Clip Studio for those edits, so everything is fine with the scene data.

If you are missing a mod you can easily find them on Koikatsu Discord server.

I will also like to announce my Fanbox and Unifans pages for those who are interested in supporting my work.
From there you will be able to access my previews, exclusive content, and early scene data.

[Fanbox] https://ntr-eros.fanbox.cc
[Unifans] https://app.unifans.io/c/eros_ntr

Thank you all for supporting me in any shape or form, be it by leaving a like, bookmarking or leaving a comment. I truly appreciate it.
